item.title: Overseas stock markets plunge, U.S. futures tumble as tariff turmoil continues
item.description: Overseas financial markets plummeted Monday and U.S. stock futures fell again in reaction to the Trump administration's latest tariff salvos.

item.title: Alex Ovechkin breaks Wayne Gretzky's NHL goals record
item.description: Alex Ovechkin made history when he scored against the New York Islanders on a power play in the second period.

item.title: "Doomsday mom" Lori Vallow Daybell's Arizona trial underway
